Name: Catch the Yeti!
About the game: Catch the Yeti! is a puzzle game set in a snowy forest where you try to catch, the yeti! Your goal is to corner the yeti by shaking snow off the trees. Key Features: - Cute 3D Graphics - 200+ Unique Puzzle Maps
